pr_title: MR: use encryption manager for input files

timeline.bodyText: @rdblue @rdsr , I saw your comments in #985 about remove customized serialization. Now the IcebergSplit implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputSplit which extends writable. So I keep serialization implementation. Does this make sense to you?
timeline.author: chenjunjiedada

timeline.message: MR: use encryption manager for input files
MR: use encryption manager for input files

timeline.bodyText: This is named io in Table, so I don't think a longer name is needed here.
